item.title: Fleet of 30?
item.description:
kdvr.com
WASHINGTON COUNTY, Colo.  --Law enforcement officials in at least 4 Colorado counties are looking for the source of some mysterious drone sightings. Sheriffs in Phillips, Lincoln, Yuma, and Washington Counties all confirm unusual sightings over the past week. In most cases, those drones have been flying in formations, between 6-10 P.M., according to Washington County Sheriff Jon Stivers.

item.title: Thousands of salmon escape fish farm...
item.description:
www.seattlepi.com
JUNEAU, Alaska (AP) - The owners of a Canadian facility where thousands of Atlantic salmon escaped following a fire said it is likely predators ate most of the fish. Mowi Canada West downplayed threats to wild salmon stocks because of the number of sea lions feeding on the 21,000 non-native salmon held in pens there, CoastAlaska reported Thursday.
